A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie actually created a character more annoying than Jar-Jar Binks!
Actually\, TWO characters: Rose and General Purple Hair!

Honestly\, I'd sooner watch a whole movie about Jar Jar than ever have to see Rose's face again. She is the most irritating\, smug\, preachy\, self-righteous and pointless character ever created in a Star Wars film.
